DOC.detailed_description: This open , single-arm , multicenter 2 phase clinical study evaluate efficacy safety chimeric antigen receptor T cell immunotherapy ( CAR-T ) treatment CD19 positive lymphoma . The study conduct use phaseⅠ/Ⅱdesign study follow sequential phase : part A ( screen , leukapheresis , cell product preparation cytoreductive chemotherapy ) part B ( treatment follow-up ) . The follow-up period participant approximately 35 month final CAR-T infusion . The total duration study expect approximately 3 year . A total 24 patient may enrol period 3 year .
